title: Sri Lanka & Austria to build a fresh momentum for cooperation in all areas of mutual interest
content: “Our main focus was on strengthening high levels of bilateral exchange has made in place, thus helping to expand the cooperation in the fields of trade and economic relations, culture, education and sports, “ stated President Maithripala Sirisena delivering a media statement following official talks with the Federal President of Austria, Heinz Fischer, in Vienna on February 19.
